title: Aaron Gold
description: This week Mr. Aaron Gold (@AboutCars) joins us to discuss the Lexus RC F launch.  In addition we spend an indordinate amount of time talking about mid-century busses, diesel abominations of the malaise era and why you should drive a 2015 Hyundai Genesis instead of a Dodge Viper.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week Mr. Aaron Gold (@AboutCars) joins us to discuss the Lexus RC F launch.  In addition we spend an indordinate amount of time talking about mid-century busses, diesel abominations of the malaise era and why you should drive a 2015 Hyundai Genesis instead of a Dodge Viper.
